name: Space Mutant Chickens(DEMO)
description:
Within many years in the world of chickens a scientist began to illegally experiment with chickens, to transform them into super soldiers and deadly weapons, because the planet of chickens was a defenseless planet.

One day it was announced on the news that a horde of alien spaceships wanted to invade the world of chickens, luckily he had managed to create a space-resistant chicken, he had equipped it with a nuclear laser shooter, and made it fly into space.

Traversing the atmosphere began to see spaceships.

They had to be stopped.
